original_title: Thomas & Friends: Whale of a Tale and Other Sodor Adventures
overview: Thomas and Friends have tall tales to tell. A rumor about Toby spreads, as Henry thinks he's got chickenpox. Thomas blames a made up engine, while Toad spots a stranded whale. Featuring the episodes: Toad and the Whale, Who's Geoffrey?, The Truth About Toby, Lost Property and Henry Spots Trouble.
title: Thomas & Friends: Whale of a Tale and Other Sodor Adventures
